generated_body: The article likely discusses the recent incident involving Mason Rudolph, who was struck in the head with his own helmet during a game. Readers might expect an analysis of the events surrounding the incident, including any fallout or reactions from fans, players, and commentators. There may also be a focus on the implications for Rudolph's performance and reputation, as well as discussions about accountability in such situations. It could explore whether the scrutiny he faces is warranted, as some may believe he isn't receiving enough blame for the circumstances.
